mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Our Command!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I stroll into my Bank of Entitlement branch, feeling like the king of the world, expecting the red carpet treatment as always. But what do I see? A line. A LINE of *regular* people waiting to be served! Can you believe the audacity? I storm up to the teller, demanding to be seen immediately. "Do you know who I am? I'm Hot Josh, the CEO of Bank of Entitlement!" I bellowed, because it's not like they have my picture plastered all over the place there. Well, after a few minutes of me making a scene, they finally ushered me into a private office, where they apologized profusely and offered me a massage while I waited. And that's how you assert your entitlement, folks.
